page.title: 18Religion/Jehovah's Witnesses
page.content: Life as a{Jehovah's Witness}can sometimes be difficult as well as rewarding. The rewarding part is the assemblies where you get to meet lots of friendly people and even see some clever dramas. Every Thursday and Sunday we have assemblies at the{Kingdom Hall. }Here a speaker talks to us about Jehovah and we read our book called{THE WATCH {TOWER.} There are also dramas put on at the Kingdom Hall, in May 1985 we had one about Pentecost, which was great fun but also helped you understand and learn about Pentecost. We also have house meetings on Tuesdays when we study a book called {Survival Into a New Earth. A difficult thing is that witnesses are supposed to preach to people every day. By DAVID TURFORD & SARAH WILDE.
